title: T206 Cy Young (Bare Hand Shows) raw
author: tiger8mush

posts.post_title: T206 Cy Young (Bare Hand Shows) raw
posts.post_content:
$360 shipped
PM or [url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url]

Strong color, decent centering and good corners and edges.  However, there are multiple creases - about 5 main ones.  One diagonally at upper right, a second starting at right edge going horizontally towards his mouth, another that extends from the right edge thru his shoulder and tot he left edge, a 4th smaller one just below that, and a 5th that is faint but starts on the right edge just above his hand and runs down to the lower left edge.  Piedmont 350/25 back has glue paperloss on all four corners.  Paper is slightly wrinkly in the "350 Subjects" area.  A nice low grade example with good eye appeal.

Thanks!
Rob
:)
